title: 光復香港時代革命英文係乜？

replies.msg: 點同外國人解釋呢句口號

Liberate Hong Kong
Age of Revolution

Definition: To prevent HK from corruption
To make changes from current constitution

個人意見

quote.msg: 點同外國人解釋呢句口號

replies.msg:
Make Hong Kong great again
The Age of Revolution

雖然意思上有别，但我覺得用generation revolution 比較好，代表我哋80,90,00嘅新世代香港人為主導嘅一段歴史。
光復我覺得用unchain 會比較貼切，因為佢國都唔想今次有太慘烈嘅事件，用温文少少嘅字會好啲。同埋我哋真係好似一隻比支共用鏈鎖住嘅狗咁成日迫我哋感恩，又唔比我哋發圍

quote.msg:
Liberate Hong Kong
Age of Revolution

Definition: To prevent HK from corruption
To make changes from current constitution

個人意見

replies.msg:
How about "Rejuvenate HK"?

"Rejuvenate" means to restore to an original or new state, or to make young or youthful again

HK was much better than now, is it?

CNN咁譯

Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times

quote.msg:
Liberate Hong Kong
Age of Revolution

Definition: To prevent HK from corruption
To make changes from current constitution

個人意見

How about "Rejuvenate HK"?

"Rejuvenate" means to restore to an original or new state, or to make young or youthful again

HK was much better than now, is it?

but Liberate also means Liberate Hong Kong from CCP ruling.
only by doing that we can truly become "One country, Two systems"

replies.msg:
Well, I searched the Chinese meaning and found the following (http://www.chinesewords.org/dict/33106-805.html ):

光復: 恢復，收復。

《晉書·桓溫傳》：“光復舊京，疆理 華夏 。” 宋 陳鵠 《耆舊續聞》卷六：“光復丕基，邁 文帝 大橫之兆。” 章炳麟 《＜革命軍＞序》：“今 中國 既滅亡于逆胡，所當謀者光復也，非革命云爾。”

From the above, 光復 actually means to restore order, to bring back to an old state. In my opinion, 光復香港 is to bring back the past glory to HK, which also implies the liberation of HK from the CCP rule.

In comparison, to liberate simply means to set sth free.
